root.name: The King of Fighters Kyo
root.description: This unique game in the King of Fighters franchise is not a fighting game like the others. Instead, this game is an RPG told through the eyes of Kyo Kusanagi during the events in-between the King of Fighters '96 and King of Fighters '97 tournaments. The battle system is very much alike the Megaman Battle Network series of games with players controlling spaces and picking moves from a list per turn.

similar_games.game: Mega Man Battle Network 5: Double Team DS
